item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-04
item.description: Samsung Galaxy A53 leak leaves little to the imagination with official-looking renders, specs (2 minute read) Details on Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy A53 have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-10
item.description: WhatsApp Launches Instant Cryptocurrency Payments in the US (2 minute read) WhatsApp has launched a cryptocurrency payment feature with Novi integration for a limited number of users in the US.
